[18] Linux 5.1 introduces stats for attached BPF programs: total run time and run count. bpftool prints them with classic info dump:

2 git tricks I recently learned:

git rebase <branch> -i -x make

Builds every commit during a rebase. Use 'make -j8' (quoted) for parallel build.

git log -L :<func_name>:<file_name>

Shows commits changing a specific function in a file.
